attributes.action: Jamie Carragher deserves a Queens Honour.
attributes.additional_details:
In terms of what Jamie Carragher has achieved for both his football club, Liverpool F.C and for his country, it is considered through his total honourably nature that he deserves the up most honour that is possible to him. Making 723 appearance to date for Liverpool as well as gaining 38 caps for England, he is the true one-man club player. Also with his Charity foundation, the 23 Foundation, which helps local children of Merseyside achieve their dreams.

We feel that he deserves an honour for these personal achievements. Thankyou.
